overview: Luciano Pavarotti at his best during the 1978 Christmas concert. The first video recording of this great singer in a magnificent performance of sacred music, Schubert's Ave Maria, Franck's Panis Angelicus and other Christmas melodies, such as Minuit, Cr√©tiens at the historic Montreal Notre-Dame basilica. This program received the Christopher Society of New York award in 1981.
title: Pavarotti: Christmas At Notre-Dame
